content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Close related Workbench alerts November 25, 2024—When closing a case associated with an insight, users can close all Workbench alerts for the insight. These related alerts can inherit the case findings if they do not already have findings. Alerts with existing findings keep those findings. Agentic SIEM & XDR → Workbench → All Alerts © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
